2.title: NSSF Benefits & Grants
2.text:
Eligibility:
Members are eligible for this benefit when they reach the age of 55 years, or when they ultimately retire from regular employment.
How to apply:
Visit your nearest NSSF office with:
A certified copy of your retirement letter OR certificate of service OR termination letter.
NSSF Membership Card
National Identity Card/ Passport/ Alien ID.
Bank details for EFT.
You will be issued with the appropriate application forms and advised on the steps to take in order to complete the benefits application.

6.title: NHIF Registration Guide - Complete Steps
6.text:
# NHIF Registration Guide

## How to Register for NHIF

### Option 1: Online Registration
1. Visit www.nhif.or.ke
2. Click on "Register" or "Member Registration"
3. Fill in your personal details:
   - National ID number
   - KRA PIN
   - Full name
   - Date of birth
   - Contact information
4. Upload required documents (ID copy, passport photo)
5. Submit and receive confirmation

### Option 2: Huduma Centre Registration
1. Visit any Huduma Centre across Kenya
2. Bring the following documents:
   - Original National ID card
   - KRA PIN certificate or PIN number
   - Passport-size photo (if required)
3. Fill out the NHIF registration form
4. Pay the registration fee (if applicable)
5. Receive your NHIF membership card

### Required Documents
- National ID card (original and copy)
- KRA PIN certificate or PIN number
- Passport-size photograph
- Contact details (phone number, email, physical address)

### Registration Fees
- **Self-employed individuals**: Minimum KES 500 per month
- **For
